AccountName.Description: This function returns account name under the context of All ledger entries/Ledger entries.
AccountName.Name: AccountName

ActualPaidFor.Description: This function returns the Total Amount of all the Payment Vouchers made through a specified Bank Ledger to a specified Employee for a given period.Exception:This is used in the Payment Advice Report of Payroll.
ActualPaidFor.Name: ActualPaidFor

AddlColumnValue.Description: This function is used to add column in multicolumnar reports.
AddlColumnValue.Name: AddlColumnValue

Alias.Description: This function returns the alias name of the current object.For every object there is an alias name.This can be entered in master level.By this function that name is retrieved.
Alias.Name: Alias

AllocIndentQty.Description: This function gives the allocated amount for the bill name in the bill vouchers of the bill, which are specified in the Ledger Entry collection of the object Bill.
AllocIndentQty.Name: AllocIndentQty

Allow.Description: This function checks the permissions for the currently logged in user.
Allow.Name: Allow

AllowCreateAnyVoucher.Description: This function checks if user has security access to create a voucher of any voucher type or not. Based on optional parameter, it will consider whether voucher type is active or not.
AllowCreateAnyVoucher.Name: AllowCreateAnyVoucher

AllowCreateVoucher.Description: This function checks if user has security access to create a voucher of given voucher type or not. The function returns result based on current for current comapny OR given company also considering isactive (optional) - if provided.
AllowCreateVoucher.Name: AllowCreateVoucher

AnyGSTNotificationPending.Description: This function returns if GST Notification is pending for given Company (if given) or any company
AnyGSTNotificationPending.Name: AnyGSTNotificationPending

AttdFor.Description: This function is used to fetch the number of days an employee is Absent or present for a specific period.Here parameter passed 'Absent' is an attendance type.
AttdFor.Name: AttdFor

BankersDate.Description: Retrives the $BankersDate value from the voucher. This function works only in the voucher object context.
BankersDate.Name: BankersDate

BillValue.Description: This function is used to retrieve the bill value of an object by passing or not passing multiple parameters. Passing without parameters, retrieves the net bill amount.Passing a logical value 'Yes', retrieves the Debit bill amount. Passing a logical value 'No', retrieves the credit bill value. Passing a logical value  retrieves either overdue bills, From age, To Age or the due date values.
BillValue.Name: BillValue

BuySpecRate.Description: This function gives the specified rate of exchange value for a date.If no value is specified it gives the rate for last date before the specified date.
BuySpecRate.Name: BuySpecRate

CCAQtyClosing.Description: This function provides the Closing Balance Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Closing Balance Quantity.
CCAQtyClosing.Name: CCAQtyClosing

CCAQtyCredits.Description: This function provides the Credit Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Credit Quantity.
CCAQtyCredits.Name: CCAQtyCredits

CCAQtyDebits.Description: This function provides the Debit Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Debit Quantity.
CCAQtyDebits.Name: CCAQtyDebits

CCAQtyOpening.Description: This function provides the Opening Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Opening Quantity.
CCAQtyOpening.Name: CCAQtyOpening

CCBQtyClosing.Description: This function provides the Closing Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Closing Quantity.
CCBQtyClosing.Name: CCBQtyClosing

CCBQtyCredits.Description: This function provides the Credit Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Credit Quantity.
CCBQtyCredits.Name: CCBQtyCredits

CCBQtyDebits.Description: This function provides the Debit Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Debit Quantity.
CCBQtyDebits.Name: CCBQtyDebits

CCBQtyOpening.Description: This function provides the Opening Quantity of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Opening Quantity.
CCBQtyOpening.Name: CCBQtyOpening

CCClosing.Description: This function provides the Closing Balance of the specified Cost Centre. The function accepts the CostCentreName as parameter and as a result, displays the Closing Balance.
CCClosing.Name: CCClosing

CCCredits.Description: This function provides the Credit amount total of the specified Cost Centre.
CCCredits.Name: CCCredits

CCDebits.Description: This function provides the total debit amount of the specified cost center.
CCDebits.Name: CCDebits

CCGLClosing.Description: This returns Closing balance value of a Cost Centre for a particular group or Ledger in the parameter and retrieves value under Cost Centre object. The Ledger Name and Group Name parameter in this function accepts formulae, variable and string.
CCGLClosing.Name: CCGLClosing

CCGLCredits.Description: This returns the total credit balance value of a Cost Centre for a particular group or Ledger in the parameter and retrieves value under Cost Centre object.
CCGLCredits.Name: CCGLCredits

CCGLDebits.Description: This returns total Debit balance value of a Cost Centre for a particular group or Ledger in the parameter and retrieves value under Cost Centre object. Ledger Name and Group Name parameter accepts functions, variable and string.
CCGLDebits.Name: CCGLDebits

CCGLOpening.Description: This returns Opening balance value of a Cost Centre for a particular group or Ledger in the parameter and retrieves value under Cost Centre object.The Ledger Name and Group Name parameter in this function accepts functions, variable and string.
CCGLOpening.Name: CCGLOpening

CCGSAQtyClosing.Description: This returns the Closing Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSAQtyClosing.Name: CCGSAQtyClosing

CCGSAQtyCredits.Description: This function returns the Credit Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSAQtyCredits.Name: CCGSAQtyCredits

CCGSAQtyDebits.Description: This function returns the Debit Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSAQtyDebits.Name: CCGSAQtyDebits

CCGSAQtyOpening.Description: This function returns the opening Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSAQtyOpening.Name: CCGSAQtyOpening

CCGSBQtyClosing.Description: This function returns the closing Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSBQtyClosing.Name: CCGSBQtyClosing

CCGSBQtyCredits.Description: This function returns the credit Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSBQtyCredits.Name: CCGSBQtyCredits

CCGSBQtyDebits.Description: This function returns the Debit Quantity for the Cost Centre.
CCGSBQtyDebits.Name: CCGSBQtyDebits

CCGSBQtyOpening.Description: This function returns the Opening Quantity for the Cost Centre
CCGSBQtyOpening.Name: CCGSBQtyOpening

CCOpening.Description: This function provides the Opening Balance of the specified Cost Centre.
CCOpening.Name: CCOpening

ClassLogicalValue.Description: This function is used to check if the method for a Particular voucher Type of Particular class is enabled or not.If enabled, a Logical Value Yes is returned, else a No is returned.
ClassLogicalValue.Name: ClassLogicalValue

CmpExistsOnDisk.Description: This function is used to check availability of companies in the given path.Current path is the path given in company selection prompt.If in the path any companies exist,this function returns the logical value 'yes' else it will return 'no'.
CmpExistsOnDisk.Name: CmpExistsOnDisk

CmpNumberFromPath.Description: This function returns the company number from the specifed path as string.
CmpNumberFromPath.Name: CmpNumberFromPath

ColumnValue.Description: Returns the columnar total for each repeated ledger.
ColumnValue.Name: ColumnValue

CompanyBaseCurrency.Description: Gives the base currency of the current company.
CompanyBaseCurrency.Name: CompanyBaseCurrency

CopyFrom.Description: This function is used to copy the content of entire object.
CopyFrom.Name: CopyFrom

DirectAllVch.Description: This function provides the total number of vouchers for the specified voucher type name.
DirectAllVch.Name: DirectAllVch

DirectCancVch.Description: This function provides the total number of cancelled vouchers for the specified voucher type name.
DirectCancVch.Name: DirectCancVch

DirectOptionalVch.Description: This function provides the total number of optional vouchers for the specified voucher type name.
DirectOptionalVch.Name: DirectOptionalVch

DirectTotalVch.Description: This function provides the total number of vouchers saved for a particular voucher type.Retirn type is number.
DirectTotalVch.Name: DirectTotalVch

ExplicitAllow.Description: This function checks if the permission is allowed to view a report etc. explicitly for a user, who otherwise would not have access by default.
ExplicitAllow.Name: ExplicitAllow

FilterAssessableAmt.Description: This function is used to get the VAT Assessable Amount of a Tax classification by filter.
FilterAssessableAmt.Name: FilterAssessableAmt

FilterVATTaxAmt.Description: This function is used to get the VAT Tax Amount of a Tax classification by filter.
FilterVATTaxAmt.Name: FilterVATTaxAmt

FirstContraAcc.Description: This function retrieves first contra Ledger Name against the selected Ledger / Group. This is basically used in Ledger / Group Voucher report. Typically in a Voucher, if first amount is 'Debit' then it would return First 'Credit' Ledger Name in the voucher.
FirstContraAcc.Name: FirstContraAcc

FirstContraInv.Description: This function retrieves first contra Stock Item Name against the selected Stock Item. This is used in Stock Voucher report. Typically in a Stock Journal Voucher, there is an inward and outward movement of Stock. In such case a Stock Item's Stock Journals are displayed. If the selected Stock Item has inward movement it would retrieve the First Stock Item Name in the Outward movement.
FirstContraInv.Name: FirstContraInv

FirstPartyName.Description: Gives the first occurence of specified inventory item in stock
FirstPartyName.Name: FirstPartyName

GetChequeRange.Description: It gives the last available cheque no.
GetChequeRange.Name: GetChequeRange

GetCmpNameFromPath.Description: This function returns the company name from the specifed path.
GetCmpNameFromPath.Name: GetCmpNameFromPath

GetCmpNumFromPath.Description: This function returns the company number from the specifed path.
GetCmpNumFromPath.Name: GetCmpNumFromPath

GetDateExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Description: This function searches for signed returnwise details with given return, section and period less than the given, parses the given expression in that object context and returns the date value.In case of any failure/signed version not found then Empty value is returned
GetDateExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Name: GetDateExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn

GetDiscountFromLevel.Description: To get a discount value for specified Price Level, Date & Quantity.
GetDiscountFromLevel.Name: GetDiscountFromLevel

GetForexAmount.Description: Returns the amount with forex content.
GetForexAmount.Name: GetForexAmount

GetItemQuantity.Description: This function returns the quantity as per specified UOM and for the specified item with number of decimals specified.
GetItemQuantity.Name: GetItemQuantity

GetLastExchangeOnlineTime.Description: This function returns last exchanged date and time for given parameter(s). Purpose is mandatory and rest of the parameters are optional
GetLastExchangeOnlineTime.Name: GetLastExchangeOnlineTime

GetLastPinDistance.Description: The function is used to retrieve the last saved distance for the pincode combination specified in the eway bill for a specific party ledger.
GetLastPinDistance.Name: GetLastPinDistance

GetLocForPin.Description: The function is used to retrieve the last saved Location for specific PIN for a given Master Type and Name. Currently the data is persisted only for Ledger and Default Tax Unit
GetLocForPin.Name: GetLocForPin

GetLogicalExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Description: This function searches for signed returnwise details with given return, section and period less than the given, parses the given expression in that object context and returns the logical value.In case of any failure/signed version not found then Empty value is returned
GetLogicalExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Name: GetLogicalExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn

GetPartyGSTINs.Description: This function returns comma (or any other character specified in optional parameter) separated list of GSTINs configured in the Given Ledger Master. If the Ledger specifies is not found, then return Empty String
GetPartyGSTINs.Name: GetPartyGSTINs

GetPriceFromLevel.Description: To get a price for a specified Price Level, Date & Quantity.
GetPriceFromLevel.Name: GetPriceFromLevel

GetPricePrevDate.Description: To get the selling price date for the last sale made using the current price level for a given product.
GetPricePrevDate.Name: GetPricePrevDate

GetSysIdExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Description: This function searches for signed returnwise details with given return, section and period less than the given, parses the given expression in that object context and returns the sysid. In case of any failure/signed version not found then Empty value is returned
GetSysIdExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn.Name: GetSysIdExprValueFromPrevSignedReturn

GetTaxObjPartyValue.Description: This function gives the tax object party value.
GetTaxObjPartyValue.Name: GetTaxObjPartyValue

GetTSServerName.Description: This function return the server name for a given end point.
GetTSServerName.Name: GetTSServerName

GetVchCount.Description: This function provides the total number of  voucher counts between specified 'from date' and 'to date'. It includes 'regular', 'optional' and 'cancelled' vouchers. 'From Date' & 'To Date' parameters needs to be specified for this calculation .
GetVchCount.Name: GetVchCount

GlobalAllow.Description: This function checks whether the current user has the right to an operation of the family across all the loaded companies or not. It will return 'Yes' if the operation is allowed in at least one company.
GlobalAllow.Name: GlobalAllow

GlobalExplicitAllow.Description: This function checks whether the permission is allowed explicitly for a user or not. By default, this user will not have access to all the loaded companies.
GlobalExplicitAllow.Name: GlobalExplicitAllow

GodownGroupValue.Description: Returns the value for the method in a godown for a stock group.
GodownGroupValue.Name: GodownGroupValue

GodownItemValue.Description: This function is used to retrieve the value of a method, by passing the Godown Name and StockItem. The Value or Quantity of the given StockItem, in the given Godown is retrieved by this method.
GodownItemValue.Name: GodownItemValue

GrossPayFor.Description: This Function is used to find the total Amount paid to an Employee for a particular ledger for a specified period without considering Attendance.
GrossPayFor.Name: GrossPayFor

GrossVchPayFor.Description: This function calculates the pay value for the corresponding payhead.
GrossVchPayFor.Name: GrossVchPayFor

GrpInQty.Description: This function provides the total quantity inward in Material Transfer In or Out of a specified stock item for a specified accounting Group Name.
GrpInQty.Name: GrpInQty

GrpInValue.Description: This function provides the total inward value in Material Transfer In or Out of a specified stock item for a specified accounting Group Name.
GrpInValue.Name: GrpInValue

GrpOutQty.Description: This function provides the total quantity outward in Material Transfer In or Out of the specified stock item for the specified accounting Group Name.
GrpOutQty.Name: GrpOutQty

GrpOutValue.Description: This function provides the total outward value in Material Transfer In or Out of a specific stock item for the specified accounting Group Name.
GrpOutValue.Name: GrpOutValue

GrpPurcBaseValue.Description: This function provides the total purchase value of a specified stock item for a specified accounting Group Name excluding addl cost.
GrpPurcBaseValue.Name: GrpPurcBaseValue

GrpPurcQty.Description: This function provides the total quantity purchased of a specified stock item for a specified accounting Group Name.
GrpPurcQty.Name: GrpPurcQty

GrpPurcValue.Description: This function provides the total purchase value of a specified stock item for a specified accounting Group Name.
GrpPurcValue.Name: GrpPurcValue

GrpSaleQty.Description: This function provides the total quantity sold of the specified stock item for the specified accounting Group Name.
GrpSaleQty.Name: GrpSaleQty

GrpSaleValue.Description: This function provides the total sales value of a specific stock item for the specified accounting Group Name.
GrpSaleValue.Name: GrpSaleValue

HasCommonUnit.Description: This function checks whether the unit entered and the unit available at the master is same.
HasCommonUnit.Name: HasCommonUnit

HeadUnits.Description: This function returns simple head unit used/referenced in a given UoM. If given UoM is simple then it returns the same. If UoM is empty then it return empty. If UoM given is not available then it results in error
HeadUnits.Name: HeadUnits

HiLoClDate.Description: This function provides the higher or lower value of a date based on the logical parameter specified for a closing balance of an object. If the parameter is Yes then it will return lower date.
HiLoClDate.Name: HiLoClDate

HiLoClQty.Description: This function provides the higher or lower quanity of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return higher quantity.
HiLoClQty.Name: HiLoClQty

HiLoClVal.Description: This function provides the higher or lower amount of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return higher amount.
HiLoClVal.Name: HiLoClVal

HiLoCrDate.Description: This function provides the higher or lower  outward movement date of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return latest date.
HiLoCrDate.Name: HiLoCrDate

HiLoCrQty.Description: This function provides the higher or lower outward movement quantity of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return lowest outward quantity.
HiLoCrQty.Name: HiLoCrQty

HiLoCrVal.Description: This function provides the highest or lowest credit amount of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return higher amount.
HiLoCrVal.Name: HiLoCrVal

HiLoDrDate.Description: This function provides the higher or lower  inward movement date of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return latest date.
HiLoDrDate.Name: HiLoDrDate

HiLoDrQty.Description: This function provides the higher or lower inward movement quantity of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return lowest outward quantity.
HiLoDrQty.Name: HiLoDrQty

HiLoDrVal.Description: This function provides the highest or lowest debit amount of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return higher amount.
HiLoDrVal.Name: HiLoDrVal

HiLoNettCrVal.Description: This function provides the highest or lowest credit nett amount of a collection given. If the parameter is Yes then it will return higher amount.
HiLoNettCrVal.Name: HiLoNettCrVal

IsAccountingVch.Description: This function is used to check if the specified voucher type is Accounting Voucher or not. It returns logical value.
IsAccountingVch.Name: IsAccountingVch

IsAdjustmentClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'IsAdjustmentClassification'. The function $$IsAdjustmentClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'IsAdjustmentClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'IsAdjustmentClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsAdjustmentClassification.Name: IsAdjustmentClassification

IsAnyFetchedDataReset.Description: This function checks to see if any Fetched Data is reset for given Purpose, Tax Unit, Return and Date Range. Even if any data was reset for sub-set of given period then Returns as Yes
IsAnyFetchedDataReset.Name: IsAnyFetchedDataReset

IsAttdTypeValid.Description: To filter Valid Attendance Type for an Employee in the Attendance Voucher.
IsAttdTypeValid.Name: IsAttdTypeValid

IsAttendance.Description: This function checks whether the voucher is of type Attendance or not.
IsAttendance.Name: IsAttendance

IsAttendanceType.Description: The function returns 'Yes' if the current object is 'Attendance' otherwise it returns a 'No'. This function is used to identify the 'Voucher Type' master.Returns a logical value
IsAttendanceType.Name: IsAttendanceType

IsAudited.Description: This function checks whether current object is audited or not.
IsAudited.Name: IsAudited

IsAuditModified.Description: This function checks whether the current object audited is modified or not.
IsAuditModified.Name: IsAuditModified

IsAuthAsAuditor.Description: This function is used to check if the user level has access to Auditing or not.
IsAuthAsAuditor.Name: IsAuthAsAuditor

IsBatch.Description: This function will check whether the current object  is of the type Batch or Batches.  If it is Batch or Batches it will return 'Yes' otherwise 'No'.
IsBatch.Name: IsBatch

IsBill.Description: To check whether the current object is of the type Bill or not. $$IsBill will check whether the currently active object is Bill or not.  If it is Bill it will return True otherwise return false.
IsBill.Name: IsBill

IsBudget.Description: To check if the current object is of type 'Budget'.It return logical 'Yes' if current object is of type budget else it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsBudget.Name: IsBudget

IsBudgetReport.Description: This function checks if the current report is a Budget Report or not.
IsBudgetReport.Name: IsBudgetReport

IsCompany.Description: To check if the current object is of type company or not.It returns a Logical value 'Yes' if current object is of type company, else it returns a 'No'.
IsCompany.Name: IsCompany

IsContra.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Contra or not.
IsContra.Name: IsContra

IsCostCategory.Description: To check if the current object is a cost category or not.
IsCostCategory.Name: IsCostCategory

IsCostCentre.Description: This function checks if the current object is a Cost Centre or not.
IsCostCentre.Name: IsCostCentre

IsCreditNote.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Credit Note or not.
IsCreditNote.Name: IsCreditNote

IsCurrency.Description: Used to check if the current object is Currency
IsCurrency.Name: IsCurrency

IsDebitNote.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is DebitNote or not.
IsDebitNote.Name: IsDebitNote

IsDeducteeType.Description: The Function  checks whether the dedcutee type is enabled or not. The Function $$IsDedcuteeType is used to check whether the object seleted is of type Deductee type is or not. This is used in TDS module. This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value 'Yes' if the object is of type  Deductee type  otherwise it returns 'No'.
IsDeducteeType.Name: IsDeducteeType

IsDelNote.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Delivery Note or not.
IsDelNote.Name: IsDelNote

IsDisplayReportModified.Description: This function is used to track variable modifications in non-edit reports. When it returns TRUE, it indicates that at least one variable has been modified. Saving a view will reset this value to FALSE.
IsDisplayReportModified.Name: IsDisplayReportModified

IsDuplicateARESerialNumber.Description: This function checks for same serial number for a particular Serial Number Master.
IsDuplicateARESerialNumber.Name: IsDuplicateARESerialNumber

IsDuplicateNumber.Description: This functions checks for same voucher number for same voucher type.
IsDuplicateNumber.Name: IsDuplicateNumber

IsDuplicateSerialNumber.Description: This function checks for same serial number for a particular Serial Number Master.
IsDuplicateSerialNumber.Name: IsDuplicateSerialNumber

IsDuplicateTaxRegistration.Description: This function returns TRUE if given registration number for a TaxUnit is duplicate, i.e. a TaxUnit of same tax type with same registration number already exists.
IsDuplicateTaxRegistration.Name: IsDuplicateTaxRegistration

IsEmptyObject.Description: This functions checks whether current object is empty or not.
IsEmptyObject.Name: IsEmptyObject

IsExcise.Description: This function is used to check if the current object is Excise or Not. If the object is excise, this function returns the value 'Yes', Else it returns the value 'No'.
IsExcise.Name: IsExcise

IsExciseDutyClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'ExciseDutyClassification'. The function $$IsExciseDutyClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'ExciseDutyClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'ExciseDutyClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsExciseDutyClassification.Name: IsExciseDutyClassification

IsFBTAType.Description: This function is used to check if the current object is FBT Accesse type
IsFBTAType.Name: IsFBTAType

IsFBTCategory.Description: This function is used to check if the current object belongs to FBT category
IsFBTCategory.Name: IsFBTCategory

IsGodown.Description: To check if the active object is of type 'Godown'.
IsGodown.Name: IsGodown

IsGroup.Description: This function checks whether the object belongs to a group or not
IsGroup.Name: IsGroup

IsGSTClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'GSTClassification'. The function $$IsGSTClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'GSTClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'GSTClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsGSTClassification.Name: IsGSTClassification

IsIncomeTaxClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'IsITClassification'. The function $$IsITClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'IsITClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'IsITClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsIncomeTaxClassification.Name: IsIncomeTaxClassification

IsIncomeTaxSlab.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'IsITSlab'. The function $$IsITSlab is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'IsITSlab'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'IsITSlab' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsIncomeTaxSlab.Name: IsIncomeTaxSlab

IsIndent.Description: To check if the active object is indented or not.
IsIndent.Name: IsIndent

IsIndentVoucher.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Indent  or not.
IsIndentVoucher.Name: IsIndentVoucher

IsInventoryVch.Description: This function checks whether the currently selected voucher is Inventory voucher or not.
IsInventoryVch.Name: IsInventoryVch

IsInvVch.Description: This function is used to check if the specified voucher type is Inventory voucher or not (excluding order vouchers). It returns logical value
IsInvVch.Name: IsInvVch

IsJobMaterialIssue.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Material Issue or not.
IsJobMaterialIssue.Name: IsJobMaterialIssue

IsJobMaterialReceive.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Material Receive or not.
IsJobMaterialReceive.Name: IsJobMaterialReceive

IsJobOrderIn.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Job Order In or not.
IsJobOrderIn.Name: IsJobOrderIn

IsJobOrderOut.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Job Order Out or not.
IsJobOrderOut.Name: IsJobOrderOut

IsJournal.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Journal or not.
IsJournal.Name: IsJournal

IsLBTClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'IsLBTClassification'. The function $$IsLBTClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'IsLBTClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'IsLBTClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsLBTClassification.Name: IsLBTClassification

IsLedger.Description: To check if the current object is of type 'Ledger'.
IsLedger.Name: IsLedger

IsMemo.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Memorandum or not.
IsMemo.Name: IsMemo

IsMerchantProfile.Description: The function $$IsMerchantProfile is used to check whether the current object is of type 'Merchant Profile'. This function does not accept any parameters. It returns a logical value of 'Yes' if the current object is of type 'Merchant Profile', otherwise it returns a logical value of 'No'.
IsMerchantProfile.Name: IsMerchantProfile

IsMethodChangedDuringImport.Description: This function returns if the given method is updated during Import or not. The meaning of update is is defined bsaed on if the there was any TAG present in source XML Data
IsMethodChangedDuringImport.Name: IsMethodChangedDuringImport

IsObjectInImportMode.Description: This function returns if Object is being imported. To deliverthis system checks the status of Primary Object in the curent hierarchy
IsObjectInImportMode.Name: IsObjectInImportMode

IsObjectInReaccept.Description: This function returns if Object in the context is in ReAccept or Not
IsObjectInReaccept.Name: IsObjectInReaccept

IsOrder.Description: To check if the current reference/object is of type Order.
IsOrder.Name: IsOrder

IsOrderVch.Description: This function is used to check if the specified voucher type is Order Voucher or not. It returns logical value.
IsOrderVch.Name: IsOrderVch

IsOverRun.Description: This function checks whether the values have preceeded the actual values of the current object or not.
IsOverRun.Name: IsOverRun

IsOwner.Description: This function checks the owner of the current object.
IsOwner.Name: IsOwner

IsPayment.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Payment or not.
IsPayment.Name: IsPayment

IsPayroll.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Payroll or not.
IsPayroll.Name: IsPayroll

IsPayrollVch.Description: This function is used to check if the specified voucher type is Payroll Voucher or not. It returns logical value.
IsPayrollVch.Name: IsPayrollVch

IsPeriod.Description: To check if the current object is of type Period and returns a logical value.
IsPeriod.Name: IsPeriod

IsPhysStock.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Physical Stock or not.
IsPhysStock.Name: IsPhysStock

IsPrimaryCompany.Description: This function is used to differentiate b/w a Simple Company and a Group Company.This function returns 'Yes' for the Group Company and 'No' for the Simple Company.
IsPrimaryCompany.Name: IsPrimaryCompany

IsPurchase.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Purchase or not.
IsPurchase.Name: IsPurchase

IsPurcOrder.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Purchase Order or not.
IsPurcOrder.Name: IsPurcOrder

IsRcptNote.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Receipt Note or not.
IsRcptNote.Name: IsRcptNote

IsReceipt.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Receipt or not.
IsReceipt.Name: IsReceipt

IsRejIn.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Rejection In or not.
IsRejIn.Name: IsRejIn

IsRejOut.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Rejection Out or not.
IsRejOut.Name: IsRejOut

IsRevJrnl.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Reversing Journal or not.
IsRevJrnl.Name: IsRevJrnl

IsSales.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Sales or not.
IsSales.Name: IsSales

IsSalesOrder.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Sales Order or not.
IsSalesOrder.Name: IsSalesOrder

IsSerialNumber.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'SerialNumber'. The function $$IsSerialNumber is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'SerialNumber'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'SerialNumber' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsSerialNumber.Name: IsSerialNumber

IsState.Description: This function is used to check whether the current object is of type State. It returns 'Yes' if the current object is of type State, or else it returns 'No'.
IsState.Name: IsState

IsStCategory.Description: This function is used to check whether the current object is of type Service Tax. It returns 'Yes' when the current object is of type of Service Tax, or else it returns 'No'.
IsStCategory.Name: IsStCategory

IsStockCategory.Description: This function is used to check whether the current object is of type Stock Category. It returns 'Yes' when the current object is of type of Stock Category, or else it returns 'No'.
IsStockCategory.Name: IsStockCategory

IsStockGroup.Description: To check if currently activated object is a stock group or not.  If it is stock group, the function returns a Logical value 'Yes' , else it returns a logical value 'No'. This function accepts no parameter and returns a logical value.
IsStockGroup.Name: IsStockGroup

IsStockItem.Description: This function is used to check whether the current object is of type Stock Item. It returns 'Yes' when the current object is of type of Stock Item, or else it returns 'No'.
IsStockItem.Name: IsStockItem

IsStockJrnl.Description: This function is used to check if the Voucher Type is Stock Journal or not.
IsStockJrnl.Name: IsStockJrnl

IsTariffClassification.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'TariffClassification'. The function $$IsTariffClassification is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'TariffClassification'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'TariffClassification' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsTariffClassification.Name: IsTariffClassification

IsTaxUnit.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'TaxUnit'. The function $$IsTaxunit is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'Taxunit'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'TaxUnit' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsTaxUnit.Name: IsTaxUnit

IsTDLObject.Description: This function checks whether the currently active object is internal storable object or not.
IsTDLObject.Name: IsTDLObject

IsTDSRate.Description: This function is used to check whether the object is of type TDS Nature of Payment. It returns 'Yes' if the object is of that type, or else it returns 'No'.
IsTDSRate.Name: IsTDSRate

IsTrack.Description: To check whether the current object is of the type Track.If it is valid then it returns logical value 'yes' otherwise it returns logical value 'No'.
IsTrack.Name: IsTrack

IsTrueInAnyCmp.Description: This function checks the given expression across all the loaded companies.
IsTrueInAnyCmp.Name: IsTrueInAnyCmp

IsTSAuthorised.Description: This function returns TRUE if security is enabled on the specified TallyPrime Server else it returns false.
IsTSAuthorised.Name: IsTSAuthorised

IsTSCompany.Description: This function checks whether the current company is opened through TallyPrime Server or not. It returns a logical value.
IsTSCompany.Name: IsTSCompany

IsTSPath.Description: This function checks whether the given path is TallyPrime Server path or not.
IsTSPath.Name: IsTSPath

IsUnderRun.Description: This function checks whether the values have exceeded the actual values of the current object or not.
IsUnderRun.Name: IsUnderRun

IsUnit.Description: To check if the current object is of type 'Unit of Measure'. The function $$IsUnit is used for checking the type of the current Object.  This function returns a logical value.  This function checks whether the currently activating object is of type is Unit of measure  or not. If it is unit of measure then it returns a 'Yes' value otherwise it is 'No'.
IsUnit.Name: IsUnit

IsUserAllowed.Description: This function verifies and returns true if user is allowed to perform operations on current Tally Server.
IsUserAllowed.Name: IsUserAllowed

IsValidCompanyDir.Description: This function checks whether specified path is valid company directory path or not.
IsValidCompanyDir.Name: IsValidCompanyDir

IsValidTSEndPointPath.Description: This function checks whether the given string is a valid TallyPrime Server end point or not.
IsValidTSEndPointPath.Name: IsValidTSEndPointPath

IsVatClassification.Description: To check if the current object is of type VAT /Tax Class. The function $$IsVatClassification is used to check whether the current object is of type VAT/Tax class. It accepts no parameter and returns a logical value 'yes' if the current object is type VAT /Tax class otherwise returns a logical value 'No'.
IsVatClassification.Name: IsVatClassification

IsVoucher.Description: To check whether the current object is of the type-voucher. The function $$IsVoucher is used for checking the type of the current Object.If the Current object is of type 'Voucher' then it returns a logical value 'Yes' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsVoucher.Name: IsVoucher

IsVoucherType.Description: To check the if the Current object is of type 'Voucher Type'. The function $$IsVoucherType is used to check whether the Current object is of type 'Voucher Type'.This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value of “Yes” if Current object is of type 'Voucher Type' otherwise it returns a logical value 'No'.
IsVoucherType.Name: IsVoucherType

LanguageName.Description: This function finds the default language name corresponding to a language ID and index.
LanguageName.Name: LanguageName

LastCreatedVchAltId.Description: This function returns last created voucher's alter id. The value is returned for the Voucher created manually in the same instance - where this TDL Function is executed.
LastCreatedVchAltId.Name: LastCreatedVchAltId

LastCreatedVchId.Description: This function returns last created voucher id
LastCreatedVchId.Name: LastCreatedVchId

OnAccountTotal.Description: This function returns the total amount entered with the reference 'On Account' for a specified ledger.
OnAccountTotal.Name: OnAccountTotal

OrigVchGrpCrTotal.Description: $$OrgVchGrpCrTotal will give the credit total amount for the specified group, which is supplied as a Parameter and returns a value of type Amount.
OrigVchGrpCrTotal.Name: OrigVchGrpCrTotal

OrigVchGrpDrTotal.Description: $$OrgVchGrpCrTotal will give the debit total amount for the specified group, which is supplied as a Parameter and returns a value of type Amount.
OrigVchGrpDrTotal.Name: OrigVchGrpDrTotal

OrigVchGrpTotal.Description: To refer to the Group Net total which is displayed in the Group Summary. The function $$OrgVchGrpDrTotal will give the debit total amount for the specified group which is supplied as a Parameter and returns a value of type Amount.
OrigVchGrpTotal.Name: OrigVchGrpTotal

OrigVchLedCrTotal.Description: The function $$OrigVchLedCrTotal is used to give Ledger Credit total when a user select the Button Ledger Wise in Group summary. The Ledger Name is passed as an argument to this function and it will return a value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedCrTotal.Name: OrigVchLedCrTotal

OrigVchLedCstCrTotal.Description: The function is used to find the ledgerwise cost center credit value for the current voucher. It accepts two parameters first one representing the Ledger Name and second representing the Cost center name and returns value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedCstCrTotal.Name: OrigVchLedCstCrTotal

OrigVchLedCstDrTotal.Description: The function is used to find the ledgerwise cost center debit value for the current voucher. It accepts two parameters first one representing the Ledger Name and second representing the Cost center name and returns value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedCstDrTotal.Name: OrigVchLedCstDrTotal

OrigVchLedCstTotal.Description: The function is used to find the ledgerwise cost center value for the current voucher. It accepts two parameters first one representing the Ledger Name and second representing the Cost center name and returns value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedCstTotal.Name: OrigVchLedCstTotal

OrigVchLedDrTotal.Description: The function $$OrigVchLedDrTotal is used to give Ledger Debit total when a user select the Button Ledger Wise in Group summary. The Ledger Name is passed as an argument to this function and it will return a value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedDrTotal.Name: OrigVchLedDrTotal

OrigVchLedTotal.Description: The function $$OrigVchLedTotal is used to give Ledger Net total when a user select the Button Ledger Wise in Group summary. The Ledger Name is passed as an argument to this function and it will return a value of type Amount.
OrigVchLedTotal.Name: OrigVchLedTotal

PaidFor.Description: This function is used to find the Amount paid for a Cost centre, for a particular ledger, and for a specified period
PaidFor.Name: PaidFor

PaidForCr.Description: This function is used to find the Credit amount total for an Employee for a particular ledger and for specified period.
PaidForCr.Name: PaidForCr

PaidForDr.Description: This function is used to find the Debit amount total for an Employee for a particular ledger and for specified period.
PaidForDr.Name: PaidForDr

PayFor.Description: This function gives the amount for a particular payhead of a particular Employee based upon the from date, to date , considering(Y/N) attendance and considering(Y/N) the joining date of the cost centre.
PayFor.Name: PayFor

PayheadComputeAsString.Description: This function returns the concatenated string. This function takes all the payhead values mentioned in the payhead computation subform and returns a formula.
PayheadComputeAsString.Name: PayheadComputeAsString

PayType.Description: To fetch the calculation type for a Particular payhead.
PayType.Name: PayType

PNAlias.Description: This function returns Part Number's Alias name of stock item.
PNAlias.Name: PNAlias

ResidualRate.Description: The function  is used to extract the Rate of a stock item.This function returns value of type Rate. This is extensively used in Stock Journal.
ResidualRate.Name: ResidualRate

ResidualValue.Description: The function is used to extract the total amount of a stock item.This function returns value of type Amount. This is used extensively in Stock Journal.
ResidualValue.Name: ResidualValue

RestoreListExists.Description: This function is used to check the existence of backup companies in the given path.If they exists the function returns a logical value 'Yes' else it returns a 'No'.
RestoreListExists.Name: RestoreListExists

SelectedCmps.Description: This function does not accept any parameter. It returns the number of Selected companies.
SelectedCmps.Name: SelectedCmps

SelectedNonTSCmps.Description: This function returns the total number of companies which are not loaded via Tally server. i.e. companies from local or shared data folders.
SelectedNonTSCmps.Name: SelectedNonTSCmps

StockAge.Description: This Function is used for retrieving the quantity of the expired stock based on the sorting and the ageing style.  It will return the total quantity of the expired stock items.
StockAge.Name: StockAge

StockAgeValue.Description: This Function is used for retrieving the amount of the expired stock based on the ageing style.  It will return the total amount of the expired stock items.
StockAgeValue.Name: StockAgeValue

StockPartyAge.Description: This Function is used for retrieving the quantity of the stock item for the required party for the given age range.
StockPartyAge.Name: StockPartyAge

StockPartyAgeValue.Description: This Function is used for retrieving the value of the stock item for the required party for the given age range.
StockPartyAgeValue.Name: StockPartyAgeValue

TailUnits.Description: This function returns simple unit used/referenced in a given UoM. If given UoM is simple then it returns the same. If UoM is empty then it return empty. If UoM given is not available then it results in error
TailUnits.Name: TailUnits

TSPingInfo.Description: This function is used to retrieve general information related to TallyPrime Server
TSPingInfo.Name: TSPingInfo

ValidateTINMod97.Description: Validates a given TIN number and returns whether it is valid or not.
ValidateTINMod97.Name: ValidateTINMod97

VchItemTotal.Description: Gives the total actual quantity of the current stock item for the current voucher. This Function will give the Total quantity of the current stock item for the selected voucher.
VchItemTotal.Name: VchItemTotal

VchLedTotal.Description: Gives the total amount of the current ledger for the current voucher. This function will give the total amount of the current ledger of the current voucher.Here Ledger name is the parameter which is used for finding the total.
VchLedTotal.Name: VchLedTotal

VchPayFor.Description: The function is used to fetch the amount in the voucher for a specified payhead. The payhead is supplied through the Ledger name which is passed as a parameter. It returns a value of type amount. This is used especially in payroll module.
VchPayFor.Name: VchPayFor

VchPurcBaseValue.Description: This function will display the purchase value of a specified stock item for the current purchase voucher excluding addl cost.

VchPurcCost.Description: Gives purchase cost of a specified stock item for the current voucher. This Function Returns the Purchase cost for the specified stock item based on the expression mentioned.

VchPurcPrice.Description: This function will gives the purchase price for the specified stock item.  Any string expression is acting as the Parameter of this function.
VchPurcPrice.Name: VchPurcPrice

VchPurcQty.Description: This function will display the purchase quantity of a specified stocjkitem for the current purchase voucher. Here the string Expression is the parameter.  By using this expression it will be executed.
VchPurcQty.Name: VchPurcQty

VchPurcValue.Description: This function will display the purchase value of a specified stock item for the current purchase voucher.
VchPurcValue.Name: VchPurcValue

VchRate.Description: This function returns the rate of a Stock Item in a voucher. This function works under Inventory Entries Object.The rate for a particular Item can be retrieved using this function.
VchRate.Name: VchRate

VchSalePrice.Description: This function gives the sales price, ie it returns the price of the particular stockitem for the sales voucher.
VchSalePrice.Name: VchSalePrice

VchSaleQty.Description: This function will returns the sales quantity for the specified stock item depending upon the given string expression.  Here the string expression is the parameters which is used for gathering the values which includes methods, another functions etc.
VchSaleQty.Name: VchSaleQty

VchSaleValue.Description: This function returns the sales value of the specified stock item for the current sales voucher.Here the string expression is the parameter which is used for getting the name of the particular stock item for checking the value by using this function.
VchSaleValue.Name: VchSaleValue

VchTotalQty.Description: This function returns the total number of Stock Items in a voucher. This function works under Inventory Entries Object. The total quantity for a particular Item can be retrieved using this function.Return type is Quantity.
VchTotalQty.Name: VchTotalQty
